arcade.vis

Class EnvDrawer3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.vis.Drawer
      • arcade.vis.EnvDrawer3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnvDrawer3D.Rectangular, EnvDrawer3D.Triangular

    public abstract class EnvDrawer3D
extends Drawer
    Drawer for environment lattices in 3D.

    EnvDrawer3D copies values in a Lattice array into a 2D array representation by averaging across the z direction.

    Since:
    2.4
    Version:
    2.4.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnvDrawer3D

        EnvDrawer3D(Panel panel,
            java.lang.String name,
            int length,
            int width,
            int depth,
            sim.util.gui.ColorMap map,
            java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double bounds)
        Creates a Drawer for drawing 3D environment lattices.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel the drawer is attached to
        name - the name of the drawer
        length - the length of array (x direction)
        width - the width of array (y direction)
        depth - the depth of array (z direction)
        map - the color map for the array
        bounds - the size of the drawer within the panel
